thread.title: NIce hotel in nice area
thread.title_full: NIce hotel in nice area - Review of Hotel du Printemps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sannatravel
title: NIce hotel in nice area
text:
Hotel Picpus is a great value of money. Nation area where hotel located is quiet, safe and good atmosphere. There was a small market on saturday, very french style to see when people boungth their food for weekend cooking. Hotel is clean and confortable and breakfast for Paris standard was good.
Room Tip: Rooms from upper floors have a beautifull view. See more room tips
